channel.title: Abandoned on little dog studos
channel.description: Recent content in Abandoned on little dog studos

item.title: abandoned rural school
item.description: Transform your game with this low-poly modular abandoned Japanese school asset pack, Set in a tranquil forest, and this comprehensive pack offers many options for creating a hauntingly environments

item.title: Rural train station
item.description: small, abandoned rural train station, nestled deep within a serene and overgrown woodland. The station, once a bustling stop for local travellers, now stands as a hauntingly beautiful relic of the past, enveloped by the encroaching forest.

item.title: Subway
item.description: This versatile asset pack includes intricately designed subway tunnels and a small bunker, complete with customizable graffiti options. Bring your urban environments to life with detailed, hand-painted textures that seamlessly integrate with all Little Dog projects. Perfect for creating immersive and atmospheric scenes, this pack allows you to personalize your subway with graffiti, adding a unique touch to your game world.
